sense.def:
To flirt with someone
pomeni kazati, da nas nekdo spolno privlači, vendar z njim nimamo resne ljubezenske zveze.

seg.quote: She never even flirted with other men.
He had a mild flirtation with two Danish blondes.

sense.def:
A flirt
je oseba, ki se veliko spogleduje.

To flirt with the idea of doing or having something
pomeni razmišljati o tem, da bi nekaj storili ali imeli, ne da bi pri tem delali konkretne načrte.

seg.quote: Burlington has flirted for years with the idea of a wood-burning electrical generator.
